title.narrative: Improved Family Planning & Reproductive Health Services in India Appraisal and Design Component

description.narrative: This activity (Improved Family Planning & Reproductive Health Services in India Appraisal and Design Component) is a component of Improved Family Planning and Reproductive Health Services in India reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £16,776,852. This component benefits India, and works in the following sector(s): Reproductive health care, Family planning. , with the following implementing partners: Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 01-04-2013 and the end date is 30-03-2015.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
